tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_loan_grace_period AS SELECT af.amp_activity_id, af.grace_period, af.amp_activity_id AS act_id, ao.amp_org_id FROM amp_funding af JOIN amp_organisation ao ON ao.amp_org_id = af.amp_donor_org_id WHERE af.grace_period IS NOT NULL;
